var mongoose_1 = require("mongoose");
var ProductSchema = new mongoose_1.Schema({
    name: { type: String },
    price: { type: Number },
    category: { type: String, "default": "-" },
    brand: { type: String, "default": "-" },
    originCountry: { type: String, "default": "India" },
